TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Control/ControlAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 提供有关辅助功能应用程序可使用的控件的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a control that can be used by an accessibility application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体具有辅助功能支持内置的并提供有关你的应用程序，使它能够使用可访问性客户端应用程序的信息。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括： 屏幕放大器和审阅者实用程序、 语音输入实用程序，屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备和键盘增强功能实用程序。Examples of accessibility client applications are: screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 有时想要为辅助功能客户端应用程序提供附加信息。Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications. 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供的现有控件的有限的辅助功能信息，请设置控件的， ， ，和属性值，将报告给辅助功能客户端应用程序。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 或者，如果需要更多的辅助功能信息将包括您的控件，您可以编写您自己的类派生自或类。Alternatively, if you require more accessibility information to be included with your control, you can write your own class deriving from the or classes. 例如，如果你正在编写您自己的控件的不派生自公共控件，或者您需要为您的控件中的命中测试此类操作，应创建为您的控件通过调用方法。For example, if you are writing your own control that is not derived from the common controls or you require such operations as hit testing within your control, you should create a for your control by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果重写方法，您还必须重写方法。If you override the method, you must also override the method. 获取或设置属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework. 有关辅助性对象的更多信息，请参见 MSDN Library 中的“Active Accessibility”部分。For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建复选框控件派生自类，并创建一个自定义派生的类使用。The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the class and creates a custom for the derived class to use. 派生的类中， `MyCheckBox`，具有的默认情况下，使其显示为一个切换按钮。The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an of by default so it appears as a toggle button. 派生类， `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`，重写三个属性，以说明在外观上的差异。The derived class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CPP/controlaccessibility.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CS/controlaccessibility.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/VB/controlaccessibility.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将标识符传递到指定的 WinHelp 文件`fileName`参数来标识所需的帮助主题。Pass the identifier to the WinHelp file specified by the `fileName` parameter to identify the desired Help topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有快捷键或访问键的所有对象都应都支持此属性。All objects that have a shortcut key or access key should support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用方法为每个对象可访问性客户端应用程序接收通知。You must call the method for each object the accessibility client applications are to be notified of. 方法通常称为在将属性设置或在事件处理程序。The method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler. 例如，可能会调用方法并传入的值`Hide`从事件处理程序中事件。For example, you might call the method and pass in an value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the event.
